content-type.description: In case of 2XX response status, value of mime-type part of Content-Type header (if exists)

content-length.description: In case of 2XX response status, length of response body (be careful, response could be chunked).

elemets.description: In case of 2XX response status, "text/html" content type and non-zero content length, list of HTML-tags, occured.

count.description: Number of times, the current tag occures in response
